info.title: Football - NFL
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. NFL - National Football League

externalDocs.description: After you've been given an API key and secret, enter it below and "Get" the method you'd like to try out.  Fill in the parameters with what you'd like to try, or use the built in defaults, and click "Try It!" to execute the call.  The JSON or XML response will be populated in the Response Body, the Response Body will provide you with any relevant codes, and the Request Header URI will show you how the call would be made within your application. Please note:Also, endpoints almost always require a final "/".  You will receive "596 Service Not Found" when it is missing.  An exception to this is for optional methods, such as eventId or teamId.

tags.name: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.  You can get information about a single team by including the teamId.  If you do not include a teamId, you will get all the teams for the league.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. The box, pbp, & driveCharts parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
  Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.
tags: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp (play-by-play) and driveCharts parameters.
 Default - Basic score & schedule data for the data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: driveCharts
parameters.description:
Returns the drive charts for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'driveCharts=true'.
  Default - drive chart data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 This parameter is ignored in an eventId is used.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - All the games for the current week.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - The current week.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-plays, and drive charts. However box scores, play-by-play, and drive charts are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.
tags: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide a teamId when you want information for just that team.  'box', 'pbp', & 'driveCharts' parameters are not allowed because you are requesting schedule information for a team, not an individual event.

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NFL events. (Play-by-play and Drive Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)
tags: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NFL events. However, box scores are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.
tags: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide a teamId when you want information for just that team.
 The 'box' parameter is not allowed because you are requesting schedule information for a team, not an individual event.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current week's events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: OPTIONAL - If entered, the events for that date will be returned. If not entered, the default is to return the events for the current week.  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Preferred response type

get.summary: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule i...
get.description: The scores/ resource provides score and schedule information for NFL events. (Boxscores, Play-by-play, and Shot Charts are not available in the scores endpoint.)
tags: NFL - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, drive charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current week's events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific date isn't requested, all games from the current week will be returned

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
To get all the games for the selected week.
 Default - the current week

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player, team, and venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Bye weeks for the NFL can be for the full season (...
get.description: Bye weeks for the NFL can be for the full season (default) or a specific week.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description:
Enter the week number if you want a specific week.
  Default - full season

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Enter the season if you want something other than the current season. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Returns the bye weeks for a single team.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Enter the season if you want something other than the current season. 
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description:
Conference returns teams ranked by conference instead of division.
 Default - false

parameters.name: wildCard
parameters.description: Default - false

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get standings for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
 Default - json

get.description: This will return anyone who has played since the beginning of the entered year (season).

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description: Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Historical rosters provide biographical informatio...
get.description: Historical rosters provide biographical information for players that played for a team in a single specified season.

parameters.name: teamId

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.

  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, all teams rosters within the league, or all free agents.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: This will return anyone who has played in the Pro ...
get.description: This will return anyone who has played in the Pro Bowl.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - The current season.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The referees endpoint provides biographical inform...
get.description: The referees endpoint provides biographical information for referees. Default call returns all active refs.

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description:
Returns all referees who participated since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
 If no year selected, all active referees will be returned.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of referee & country names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NFL - Season stats for a single player

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: Player Id.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.  If playerId is omitted, 'enc=true' will be ignored.
  If 'enc=true', the seasonId will be ignored if included.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NFL - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: Player Id.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned.
 * If 'all' is used, then all the splits are returned.
 * If not used, only the official totals will be returned (default = -1).
 * Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
 -- A full list of the available splitId codes can be found using the decodes resource.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId

  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept

  Default - json

To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.

  Default - the current season

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.

get.summary: By default, results include all injuries for a pla...
get.description:
By default, results include all injuries for a player (a) during the time period selected, (b) if the injury has not healed and (c) for all the teams the player was on during the time period.
 To return only those injuries while a player is on a specific team, you must include /teams/:teamId in the URI.

get.summary: NFL - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Trailers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
To get data for only one conference, enter the conferenceId.
  Default - all NFL returned when no conferenceId selected

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NFL - Leaders by Week

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Leaders returned for the selected week only. If no week is selected, leaders for the most recent week will be returned.

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.
  Default - Blank (returns Passing Yards).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

parameters.name: season

To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Odds for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Valid only when event type is Postseason.
 Default - All rounds combined

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
For team names/nicknames/abbreviations only. Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name/nickname/abbreviation.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
